ema kabinat raswimen pasu lakshman jayakodi mahatha durakathanayen mata katha kota kiwe amathiwarunge wathkam barakam pa්rakasha pa්rasiddha kirimata awashya nathi bawata thindu kala bawath eheth thamage mathaya wanne ee gana poronduwak di athi nisa eeta anukulawa ka්riyakirima sudusu bawa ha ee anuwa thamage wathkam barakam pa්rakashaya faks kota ma wetha ewana bawath awashya nam eya pa්rasiddha karanawata thaman wiruddha nowana bawathya.inpasu elambaena chandrika palana yugayedi mema nithiya arabaya age aanduwe sanwedibhawaya pariksha karanu pinisa eka warak nowa awastha gananawakadi janadhipathi lekam balapatabandi magin liyapadinchi thapalen yawana lipi gananawak magin age amathi mandala samajikayange wathkam barakam pa්rakashawala pitapath illa sitiyada kisidu yahapath pa්rathicharayak labaganimata asamath wiya.
